verbs.description: [ARG0: report] [V: finds] [ARG1: no wrongdoing] [ARGM-TMP: after inmate escapes lake correctional institute] an investigation determined florida department of corrections officers did nothing wrong when an inmate escaped the lake correctional institute but suggested installing further security measures to stop a similar incident from happening again florida department of corrections lake correctional institute alinton john officer fdoc office
